name: Through The Quarantine
description:
ArtCenter GameJame Project, Through the Darkness

Duration: 48 Hour

Tool Used: Unity Engine

The game is called through the quarantine, the player will control a kid who stays at home without a parent because of the covid, he needs to control his feeling and do things his mom told him to do. Also, he keeps waiting for his parents and his favorite grandma...

Team IN-N-OUT: 

Teri Zhang: Level Designer, Programmer

Qihuan Jiang:  Level Designer, Artist, Programmer, Narrative Designer

Heather Chen: Artist, Narrative Designer
